text: "Circle of Life" is a song from the 1994 animated Disney movie The Lion King. The song's lyrics (words) were written by Tim Rice, and the music was written by Mbongeni Ngema. It was sung by Carmen Twillie and Lebo M. The song was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Song in 1994. Two other Lion King songs were also nominated: "Can You Feel the Love Tonight" and "Hakuna Matata." "Can You Feel the Love Tonight" won the award. The beginning of the song is written in the Zulu language. The meaning is: Zulu lyrics English meaning A lion and a leopard come to this open place Here comes a lion, Father We will conquer == References == === Works cited === * * * Category:1994 songs Category:Children's songs Category:Disney Renaissance songs Category:Elton John songs Category:The Lion King Category:The Lion King songs
title: Circle of Life
